mapper.select: select w.week_name, classes_name,lecturer_name,tutor_name,course_name,lt60,gt60_lt70,gt70_lt80,gt80_lt90,gt90_lt100 from weekly_exam e,classes c, lecturer l, tutor t, course co, week w where e.classes_id = c.classes_id and e.lecturer_id = l.lecturer_id and e.tutor_id = t.tutor_id and e.course_id = co.course_id and e.week_id = w.week_id and term_id= #{termId} and e.week_id= #{weekId};

select g.grade_name, w.week_name, (students_num-lt60)/students_num rate from weekly_exam e, week w, classes c, grade g, lecturer l, tutor t where e.week_id = w.week_id and e.classes_id = c.classes_id and c.grade_id = g.grade_id and e.lecturer_id = l.lecturer_id and e.tutor_id = t.tutor_id and e.week_id >= #{beginWeekId} and e.week_id < #{endWeekId} order by g.grade_name, w.week_name
